dcterms:creator: W. Zhang
M. Zhu
K. G. Derpanis
dcterms:description: A large dataset containing video clips with 13 joints annotated in all frames, including head, shoulders, elbows, wrists, hips, knees, and ankles.
dcterms:title: Penn Action Dataset

dcterms:creator: H. Jhuang
J. Gall
S. Zufﬁ
C. Schmid
M. J. Black
dcterms:description: A dataset designed for understanding action recognition, containing various actions performed by subjects.
dcterms:title: sub-JHMDB Dataset

dcterms:creator: Ronald A. Howard
James E. Matheson
dcterms:description: A foundational work discussing risk-sensitive Markov decision processes, focusing on the implications of risk in decision-making.
dcterms:title: Risk-Sensitive Reinforcement Learning

dcterms:creator: Nicole Bäuerle
Ulrich Rieder
dcterms:description: A study extending the concepts of risk-sensitive Markov decision processes, providing further insights into risk management in decision-making.
dcterms:title: Risk-Sensitive MDPs

dcterms:creator: Asaf Cassel
Shie Mannor
Assaf Zeevi
dcterms:description: A general approach to multi-armed bandits under risk criteria, discussing strategies for managing risk in decision-making.
dcterms:title: Risk-sensitive bandits

dcterms:creator: Arnab Basu
Mrinal K. Ghosh
dcterms:description: A study on zero-sum risk-sensitive stochastic differential games, exploring the dynamics of risk in competitive environments.
dcterms:title: Risk-sensitive games

dcterms:creator: Yun Shen
Wilhelm Stannat
Klaus Obermayer
dcterms:description: An exploration of risk-sensitive Markov control processes, focusing on the implications of risk in control strategies.
dcterms:title: Risk-sensitive control
